name: Give Up the Ghost
description:
Well, it's been fun trying to participate, but I can't make puzzle levels for the life of me.  ¯\( ^‿^ )/¯  I like where I started, but I don't know how to continue.

Still submitting to the Wowie! Game Jam 3.0, but I'm not expecting anything of it. Chances are, someone else made a better game with this same concept anyways, but I'm glad I got some of my take in.
